mapper.select: SELECT homework.*,teacher.name as teacherName,course.cname as courseName FROM student JOIN sc ON student.id = sc.sno JOIN homework ON sc.cno = homework.cno JOIN teacher ON homework.tno = teacher.id JOIN course ON homework.cno = course.cno WHERE student.id = #{id} and course.cno = #{cno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sh (sno, homeworkId, cno,url) value (#{id},#{homeworkId},#{cno},#{url})
